sqlMap.select:

FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#

FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#
TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#
FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#
TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELTHR.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELThree( processmodelid,flow_id,isurgent,opninion_content,taskname,reporttime,reportcnt) values (#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flow_id:DECIMAL:-9999#,#isurgent:VARCHAR#,#opninion_content:VARCHAR#,#taskName:VARCHAR#,#reporttime:VARCHAR#,#reportcnt:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELTHREE set PROCESSMODELID =#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, FLOW_ID =#flow_id:DECIMAL:-9999#, ISURGENT =#isurgent:VARCHAR#, OPNINION_CONTENT =#opninion_content:VARCHAR#, TASKNAME =#taskName:VARCHAR#, REPORTTIME =#reporttime:VARCHAR#, REPORTCNT =#reportcnt:VARCHAR# where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select t.PROCESSMODELID,t.flow_id,t.isurgent,t.opninion_content,t.taskname,t.reporttime,t.reportcnt from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELTHREE t where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId#
